product.title: MUSEYA 24Pcs Assorted Hot Roller Clips Replacements U Shaped Stainless Steel For Salon Shop
product.description:
Description

It can be applied for curling hair or in the salon. No you have thin or thick long hair, it will help to give you the big curls, voluminous waves, and fullness you want. Designed to make your desired curly hairs, just enjoy the DIY process in easy and convenient way.-hot roller replacement clips

Features

-Color:Assorted Color
-Material: Stainless steel
-Size: 7.00X1.90X0.20cm/2.75X0.75X0.08in
- A replacement for lost or broken hot roller clip, suitable for most hot rollers' size.-hot curler pin replacement
- By using these hot curlers clips, your hair will looks so much beautiful and charming.-electric curling roller replacement clip
- They can-replacement hot roller clips help you to achieve an even more , help to make your hair rolls more perfect.
-Size: 7.00X3.20X0.20cm/2.75X1.26X0.08in
-Size: 7.00X2.54X0.20cm/2.75X1.00X0.08in
